page.title: 06Employment-survey.
page.content: Dudley Middle School conducted a job survey amongst the parents.In this area here is a large chemical works but few parents work there.The most popular type of job was in manufacturing.Near to us is a large food processing factor y and a large number of parents,espec- ially mothers work there.Alot of fath- ers work in the building trade,others work for the local council. Unemployment was one of the biggest categorys in our survey-there are not many jobs in our area for people out of work.A lot of men used to work in the mining industry but the pit in our village was closed in 1977.Since then even more mines have closed so only a few fathers are miners.
